name: Bubble Butt
storyline:
Take control of a bountifully cursed enby protagonist as they navigate a world filled with peril and problems as they search for purpose and self-love.

Make impactful choices and guide our cheeked up hero to save the world... and themselves. Three endings, 2,400 words.

*This game contains at least 80% butt puns.
summary:
A game about self-acceptance and big butts.

Take control of a bountifully cursed enby protagonist as they navigate a world filled with peril and problems as they search for purpose and self-love.

Make impactful choices and guide our cheeked up hero to save the world... and themselves. Three endings, 2,400 words.

*This game contains at least 80% butt puns.
